body.p: Born on January 23, 1836 in Louisville, Kentucky. Worked as a clerk in 1850. Served as the Assistant Adjutant General under Scott Brown and Governor Magoffin. Commissioned as Major on October 4, 1861 in the Confederate Army. Served under Simon Bolivar Buckner. Captured in the battle of Fort Donelson in February 16, 1862. Taken to Camp Chase in Ohio. Died as prisoner of war on March 21, 1862 in Columbus, Ohio.
